Trade/Device Name(s): AutoSure Voice Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AutoSure Voice Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoSure Voice Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm, for self-testing by people with diabetes or use by healthcare professionals as an aid to monitoring levels in Diabetes Mellitus; not indicated for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
